effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
The user fires a
concentrated bundle
of electricity. It may
also raise the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

The user fires a
concentrated bundle
of electricity. It may
also raise the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

The user fires a
concentrated bundle
of electricity. It may
also raise the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

Le lanceur tire un rayon chargé
d’électricité. Peut aussi augmenter
son Attaque Spéciale.

The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

でんげきの　たばを　あいてに
はっしゃする。でんきを　ためて　じぶんの
とくこうを　あげることが　ある。

전격의 다발을 상대에게
발사한다. 전기를 모아서 자신의
특수공격을 올릴 때가 있다.

Le lanceur tire un rayon chargé d’électricité.
Peut aussi augmenter son Attaque Spéciale.

Ziel wird von einem Elektrostrahl getroffen.
Steigert eventuell Spezial-Angriff des Anwenders.

Lanza un rayo eléctrico contra el objetivo. Puede
subir el Ataque Especial de quien lo usa.

Chi la usa lancia un fascio di elettricità molto
intensa. Può anche aumentare il suo Attacco
Speciale.

The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

電撃の　束を　相手に
発射する。電気を　ためて　自分の
特攻を　あげることが　ある。

でんげきの　たばを　あいてに
はっしゃする。でんきを　ためて　じぶんの
とくこうを　あげることが　ある。

발사한다. 전기를 모아서 자신의
특수공격을 올릴 때가 있다.

向對手發射電擊光束。
有時會因電流蓄積，
提高自己的特攻。
